creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters, New York; Hassam, Speicher, Betts and Symons Funds, 2018
description: abstract colorful image in white, pink, orange, brown, yellow and green with black outlines; mostly blocky and ovoid forms; yellow horizontal bar at top with orange elements in top corners; multicolored (predominately pink and white) dimensional form at center
inscription: LRC in black ink: F (inside a heart) | see Signed
signed: LRC in black: RB | bottom center in black ink: 12/30/13 | on back in black ink: Title Pink Carton / Date 12/30/13 / Size H28/W22\" / Medium acrylic on poster board / Price yes
title: Pink Cartons
